topics.body:
Here's a story on my part.

I was at a walmart a couple of months back and I decided to go wonder off and look around in the electronic section.

And while I was there I went over to where they kept the amiibo's at right?

Well while I was looking around I saw a small little kid walk in front of me and I was like "Awwww, he's looking for an amiibo" so being a nice guy I wave and in the most high pitch childish voice I go "Hi!" And the kid turns around....It wasn't a kid.

It was a Tiny Man. With grown ass facial hair and a super angry looking stare. and I'm just like staring at him for like five seconds and I just fuck off.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
